metadata.title: RDF vs Markdown Experiment - Query Suite
metadata.description: 30 test queries across simple lookups, aggregations, and relationship traversals

queries.question: What is the price of product P001?
queries.sparql: SELECT ?price WHERE { :P001 schema:price ?price }

queries.question: What is the name of product P042?
queries.sparql: SELECT ?name WHERE { :P042 schema:name ?name }

queries.question: List all products from the brand Sony.
queries.sparql: SELECT ?id ?name WHERE { ?brand schema:name "Sony" . ?product schema:brand ?brand ; schema:sku ?id ; schema:name ?name } ORDER BY ?id

queries.question: Find all products in the Electronics category.
queries.sparql: SELECT ?id ?name WHERE { ?cat schema:name "Electronics" . ?product schema:category ?cat ; schema:sku ?id ; schema:name ?name } ORDER BY ?id LIMIT 20

queries.question: What is the stock level of product P010?
queries.sparql: SELECT ?stock WHERE { :P010 schema:inventoryLevel ?stock }

queries.question: Is product P015 in stock or out of stock?
queries.sparql: SELECT ?availability WHERE { :P015 schema:availability ?availability }

queries.question: What brand makes product P025?
queries.sparql: SELECT ?brandName WHERE { :P025 schema:brand ?brand . ?brand schema:name ?brandName }

queries.question: List all products with SKU starting with P01 (P010-P019).
queries.sparql: SELECT ?id ?name WHERE { ?product schema:sku ?id ; schema:name ?name . FILTER(regex(?id, "^P01")) } ORDER BY ?id

queries.question: Find all products priced under $50.
queries.sparql: SELECT ?id ?name ?price WHERE { ?product schema:sku ?id ; schema:name ?name ; schema:price ?price . FILTER(?price < 50) } ORDER BY ?price LIMIT 10

queries.question: What products are out of stock?
queries.sparql: SELECT ?id ?name WHERE { ?product schema:sku ?id ; schema:name ?name ; schema:availability schema:OutOfStock } ORDER BY ?id LIMIT 10

queries.question: How many total products are in the catalog?
queries.sparql: SELECT (COUNT(?product) AS ?total) WHERE { ?product a schema:Product }

queries.question: What is the average price of all products?
queries.sparql: SELECT (AVG(?price) AS ?avgPrice) WHERE { ?product schema:price ?price }

queries.question: What is the average price of Electronics products?
queries.sparql: SELECT (AVG(?price) AS ?avgPrice) WHERE { ?cat schema:name "Electronics" . ?product schema:category ?cat ; schema:price ?price }

queries.question: How many products are out of stock?
queries.sparql: SELECT (COUNT(?product) AS ?count) WHERE { ?product schema:availability schema:OutOfStock }

queries.question: What is the total inventory value? (sum of price Ã— stock for all products)
queries.sparql: SELECT (SUM(?value) AS ?totalValue) WHERE { ?product schema:price ?price ; schema:inventoryLevel ?stock . BIND(?price * ?stock AS ?value) }

queries.question: What is the most expensive product price?
queries.sparql: SELECT (MAX(?price) AS ?maxPrice) WHERE { ?product schema:price ?price }

queries.question: What is the cheapest product price?
queries.sparql: SELECT (MIN(?price) AS ?minPrice) WHERE { ?product schema:price ?price }

queries.question: How many different brands are in the catalog?
queries.sparql: SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?brand) AS ?brandCount) WHERE { ?product schema:brand ?brand }

queries.question: How many products does the brand Apple have?
queries.sparql: SELECT (COUNT(?product) AS ?count) WHERE { ?brand schema:name "Apple" . ?product schema:brand ?brand }

queries.question: Which category has the most products?
queries.sparql: SELECT ?categoryName (COUNT(?product) AS ?count) WHERE { ?product schema:category ?cat . ?cat schema:name ?categoryName } GROUP BY ?categoryName ORDER BY DESC(?count) LIMIT 1

queries.question: What products are related to product P001?
queries.sparql: SELECT ?relatedId ?relatedName WHERE { :P001 schema:isRelatedTo ?related . ?related schema:sku ?relatedId ; schema:name ?relatedName }

queries.question: Find all products from the same brand as P010.
queries.sparql: SELECT ?id ?name WHERE { :P010 schema:brand ?brand . ?product schema:brand ?brand ; schema:sku ?id ; schema:name ?name . FILTER(?product != :P010) } ORDER BY ?id LIMIT 10

queries.question: Find all products in the same category as P020.
queries.sparql: SELECT ?id ?name WHERE { :P020 schema:category ?cat . ?product schema:category ?cat ; schema:sku ?id ; schema:name ?name . FILTER(?product != :P020) } ORDER BY ?id LIMIT 10

queries.question: Which brands make products in both Electronics and Clothing categories?
queries.sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?brandName WHERE { ?elecCat schema:name "Electronics" . ?clothCat schema:name "Clothing" . ?prod1 schema:category ?elecCat ; schema:brand ?brand . ?prod2 schema:category ?clothCat ; schema:brand ?brand . ?brand schema:name ?brandName } ORDER BY ?brandName

queries.question: Find products with similar prices to P005 (within 10% range).
queries.sparql: SELECT ?id ?name ?price WHERE { :P005 schema:price ?p5price . ?product schema:sku ?id ; schema:name ?name ; schema:price ?price . FILTER(?price >= ?p5price * 0.9 && ?price <= ?p5price * 1.1 && ?product != :P005) } ORDER BY ?price LIMIT 10

queries.question: What products share related products with P001? (products related to P001's related products)
queries.sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?id ?name WHERE { :P001 schema:isRelatedTo ?related . ?related schema:isRelatedTo ?product . ?product schema:sku ?id ; schema:name ?name . FILTER(?product != :P001) } LIMIT 10

queries.question: Find brands that have products priced over $1000.
queries.sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?brandName WHERE { ?product schema:price ?price ; schema:brand ?brand . ?brand schema:name ?brandName . FILTER(?price > 1000) } ORDER BY ?brandName

queries.question: Which products in the Electronics category are from the brand Canon?
queries.sparql: SELECT ?id ?name ?price WHERE { ?cat schema:name "Electronics" . ?brand schema:name "Canon" . ?product schema:category ?cat ; schema:brand ?brand ; schema:sku ?id ; schema:name ?name ; schema:price ?price } ORDER BY ?id

queries.question: Find the top 3 most expensive products in the Sports category.
queries.sparql: SELECT ?id ?name ?price WHERE { ?cat schema:name "Sports" . ?product schema:category ?cat ; schema:sku ?id ; schema:name ?name ; schema:price ?price } ORDER BY DESC(?price) LIMIT 3

queries.question: How many products does each brand have, for brands with more than 5 products?
queries.sparql: SELECT ?brandName (COUNT(?product) AS ?count) WHERE { ?product schema:brand ?brand . ?brand schema:name ?brandName } GROUP BY ?brandName HAVING (COUNT(?product) > 5) ORDER BY DESC(?count)
